document.full_text: the navy said on tuesday some arriving warships will take position on the west coast of honshu instead of heading to the east coast as planned because of "radiological and navigation hazards."
document.title: navy repositions warships over radiation risks
lines_and_colors: the navy said on tuesday some arriving warships will take position on the west coast of honshu instead of heading to the east coast as planned because of "radiological and navigation hazards."
